text: tae puok anak minkheunh teryy pitabrakd nasa a l laoh ban bangkeut avei del mean now leumekh cheachraen chean ning avei del mean now leu phendei chea brayoch samreab puok anak haey trong ban bampenh nie k meat robsa trong dl puok anak teang phnek khangokraw( khluonobran) ning phnek khangoknong( chetd koumnit) noh? haey knongchamnaom mnoussaalok mean anakakhleah chhlohbrakek knea knong rueng a l laoh daoy kmean chamnehdoeng ning kmean kar changaoulobangheanh haeyning kmean kompir bamphlu karpit
